title: RHD interior in a LHD bus?

posts.content:
Hi everyone.

A long shot I know! But has anyone fitted a RHD Devon interior into a LHD bus?

Just wondering if it's a complete waste of time trying or there is a slim possibility that it can be done.

Many thanks paul

walkthrough is easier than a non walkthrough

non walkthrough, your pretty much gonna have to remake the wardrobe and set edging
same goes for the cooker unit, pretty much remaking it

TBH - your better off just making it yourself for a LHD and maybe try and find original rear hatch furniture and door furniture
RH Devon will fit LH but requires a few mods.vot month March for photos

Thank you both for your replies.

The RHD interiors seem a bit easier to find so I thought it could be a option.

I will have a look at your photos.

Thanks again

Devon only made a VERY small number of LHD interiors. I would plan on never finding one, if you ever did then what a bonus.

I know of two. I've seen one of them in real life and the other on here.

I have only seen two..LHD and I helped the purchaser of one by prompting and helping him asking questions which turned up the evidence which convinced me it was indeed an original marked and identified Original LHD Devon Conversions interior.

In 30 years I have never even seen a hint of another..
I presumed it was a period copy..
But all the pieces were marked LH...and dated..
So I am afraid you will have to make...

Then A67man bought one from the US....
